sub_title: Experienced Footwear Manufacturing Entrepreneur, specialized in Shoe Comfort and semi-Orthopedic innovations (10K+ connections)
summary: Experienced Strategic Executive and Managerial skills with a demonstrated history of working in the Shoe Business and fast moving consumer goods industry. Skilled in Coaching, Strategy, Marketing, Market Research, Product Development and Retail. Strong business development and a professional degree (Drs.) focused in business economics at the University of Tilburg.

profile_positions.description: When taking over JJ Footwear in 1996, I introduced the Calf width system in 2003. We know at JJ Footwear that women come in "all shapes and sizes" and that a "one size fits all principle" doens't work in the shoebusiness. JJ Footwear has the widest and largest collection of boots, ranging from Extra Narrow boots (circumfernce of 30 cm / 12,5 inch), up to Wide Calf Boots up to XXXL (circumference 60 cm / 25 inch). We confectionised making boots and shoes. With one goal in mind; to build the brand JJ Footwear behind an Internet driven concept, which is currently being sold in over 20 countries. Thus providing women all over the world for the best fitting solution and the broadest and widest ( :)) choice!  We also recently introduced the JJ Footwear App and the "Personal Fit Concept",which is a new business model for the Shoe Retail business. Order less (only core collection) and re-order directly on the sales floor (as a kind of "made to order") from our broad Never Out of Stock system.
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description:
At JJ PRO Footwear we have developed during mid 2017 a Fashionable Semi Orthopedic Shoe Line with a very competive price level (at least 30 to 50% cheaper than the current Dutch standard) . The styles have been approved by NVOS Orthobanda, the highly qualified and internationally reknowned Dutch Association of Orhopedic Shoemakers. 

The technical shoe-design objectives have been met:
* Extra deep lasts with narrow heel fitting
* Dynamic rocker sole
* Available in multiple widths (E, H and K)
* Rounded heel, optimal toespring
* Stiff support with an adaptable counter
* Optimised for Diabetis and Arthritus
* Competetive Price Setting

But most of all, the design objective was to create a line of Semi-Othopedic Shoes, that's in line with the current fashion trends, so that the customer can wear these without be stared at by its surrounding. 

In the first 6 months, we have already added over 50 customers to our client list, which proves that our gut feeling is being acknowledged by the market. More innovations are currently being developed, since  insurance companies are changing their "rules" and JJ PRO Footwear will make sure that the Orthopedic market can improve their margins with this "newcomer" on the Semi-Orthopedic market.
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description: America's first website for Widecalf boots, founded in 2001. Widewidths Inc is having the widest selection of Wide Calf Boots, ranging from US size 5 up to 13, and Calf widths from 13 up to 24 inch circumference  (EU sizes 36-44, Calf widths from 35 to 60 cms).
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

company.name: New Feet - Medical Footwear for Sensitive Feet - Shoes made with Stretch leather

profile_positions.company: New Feet - Medical Footwear for Sensitive Feet - Shoes made with Stretch leather
profile_positions.description:
JJ Footwear is representing and Selling the brand NEW FEET in the Netherlands, but also to other export countries (mainly outside Scandinavia)

New Feet is a footwear company, specifically designed for women/men that have difficult and senistive feet. Originated 15 years ago by orthopedic shoemakers and surgeants who did not find the proper footwear for problem feet they encoutered in their practices. So they decided to set up a brand that was specifically designed for problem feet and sensitive feet. If you are expereincing bunions, hammertoes, arthrosis or diabetes, New Feet is thé brand to work with. 

New Feet carries a lot of features that other shoe brands don't. Please read all about it in the attached brochures, where you can also read about the use of real stretcheable leather inside their shoes, for optimal comfort for the sensitive foot.

New Feet has several lines, for Shoe Shops which sell Comfort Shoes, for specialized Comfort shoe shops and for real Orthopedic shoe shops.

New Feet also carries a professional line, for hospital and real orthopedic use. They serve all hospitals in Denmark and a vastly growing number in Norway and Sweden.

The combination of JJ Footwear and New Feet makes it possible to work together in the designing stage and on Research and Development projects. The goal is to further extend the line into the direction that also consumers, that experience all kind of footproblems, want to choose NEW FEET as their preferred brand, not only because of the technology inside, and the fact that they can happily walk again, but mainly because the shoes look great!
profile_positions.title: Strategic Sales and Distribution Partner for the Netherlands and other Export countries

company.name: SLEM Innovation & Training Institute for footwear and leather related industries - Waalwijk

profile_positions.company: SLEM Innovation & Training Institute for footwear and leather related industries - Waalwijk
profile_positions.description:
With the SLEM team we're working on realising SLEM's yearly two day conference, called the SLEMinars, this year 2017 taking place at April 20th and 21st. My responsibility is in general coordination, sponsorships, exhibition and matchmaking.

SLEM is known for its future forward and meaningful contributions to the footwear industry. The subject of the SLEMinars are written below. This year we have a World Class line up of speakers on the following subject:

Pls also have a look at www.slem.nl/sleminars 

THE FUTURE OF FOOTWEAR MANUFACTURING

WAALWIJK – Will footwear come back to Europe and the USA through high-tech factories only operated by robots? Will in-store manufacturing of tailor-made shoes be the solution for brick and mortar retail? Will we be able to have computers and scanners simply generate the shoes we need so we can 3D print them at home?

These questions and many more will be discussed at SLEM’s upcoming Future of Footwear Manufacturing SLEMinars on April 20-21, 2017.  The first conference day will be about “smart manufacturing”, in other words: how can we take existing production methods to the next level, making them more local, functional and able to provide custom-made footwear. The second day will focus on “disruptive manufacturing”, discussing entirely new methods of footwear manufacturing, from print farms to generative design systems and biotechnology solutions.

Tickets for the Future of Footwear Manufacturing SLEMinars are available at: http://www.slem.nl/sleminars.
profile_positions.title: Sponsorship & Matchmaker Team SLEMinars 2017

profile_positions.company: SLEM Innovation & Training Institute for footwear and leather related industries - Waalwijk
profile_positions.description:
SLEM is an international innovation and education institute for footwear. The name is an acronym for: Shoes, Leather, Education, Museum. SLEM is providing a unique full-time Master program for Footwear Innovators and a wide range of short courses and workshops for both students and professionals.

Our programs are all based on the synergy of four main pillars: forecasting, design, technology and business. The forecasting and business programs are suitable for other kinds of industries as well, such as leathergoods, fashion and industrial design.

SLEM's trend lab is at the heart of all our activities; the continual research and analysis assure that all programs always offer the very latest information, presented by visionary experts from the field. SLEM also provides trend information and consulting to customers around the world, through custom made projects and (online) SLEMinars.

SLEM's headquarters are based in Waalwijk, in the south of the Netherlands, but we also have branches and affiliates in Amsterdam, China and Italy.

SLEM is currently merging with the Dutch Shoe and Leather Museum, intending to open a collective institute in the near future.
profile_positions.title: Co Founder and Member of the Board

company.name: SeLL Societeit voor Schoen en Leder "De Langstraat

profile_positions.company: SeLL Societeit voor Schoen en Leder "De Langstraat
profile_positions.description: Officially founded the SeLL and, together with my board, we succesfully introduced SeLL as the business platform for shoe & leather/upholstery business. Our goals are 1) networking; 2) sharing knowledge; and 3) getting Waalwijk and "the Langstraat" on the "shoe-map" of Europe and the world. For that sake, we actively contribute to the goals of SLEM (Shoes, Leather, Education & Museum), an educational-, cultural-, industrial-, innovative- and leisure shoe and leather experience center in Waalwijk.
profile_positions.title: Co Founder and 1st Chairman

profile_positions.description: Started in the family business as a 3rd generation Shoe Manufacturer... A small shoefactory located in Drunen (in the shoe region "De Langstraat" in the Netherlands). From here, my passion for making quality shoes for women that fit like a pair of gloves, started. It has been the starting point for me in the shoesbusiness. I inherited craftmanship, business sense and passion fr shoes that has contributed to all my shoe activities in the decades to follow....
profile_positions.title: Owner
